hanzi-su-wiki:
積

Значения

Накладывать, грузить; скапливаться; намерения; площадь, поверхность; произведение; собирать, накапливать, запасы

Мнемоника

Сбор хлебов 禾 в случае воровства или плохой работы сопровождается наказанием 責. Платили же из расчёта произведения площади на средний урожай.

Варианты

积
purpleculture_pinyin:
jī
to amass; to accumulate; to store; measured quantity (such as area of volume); product (the result of multiplication); to integrate (math.); to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.); old; long-standing
накапливать; накапливать; хранить; измеряемая величина (например, площадь объема); произведение (результат умножения); интегрировать (математика); решить (или интегрировать) обыкновенное дифференциальное уравнение (математика); Старый; давний
rtega_mnemonic:
積積RS
积积		accumulate, store up, amass, long (time), old, deep-rooted, longstanding, product (mathematics)
  • responsible 責 management of the rice 禾 harvest: long time storage of multiple harvests
  • ⓢ stuffing rice 禾 in a person's mouth 只 until it's full
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 积)
Pictophonetic: 責 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
積極 [ jī jí ]: active; energetic; vigorous; positive (outlook); proactive
積極性 [ jī jí xìng ]: zeal; initiative; enthusiasm; activity
積累 [ jī lěi ]: to accumulate; accumulation; cumulative; cumulatively

heisig_chinese_memo: A wheat farmer's responsibility is to accumulate all of the wheat after harvesting buy bringing it together in big bunches. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: volume, wheat, cereal, blame, grow up, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: Wheat . . . blame. This key word has to do with measurement, and should be kept distinct from the kanji for quantity (Frame 189) - even though the meanings are similar.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: volume, product (x*y), acreage, contents, pile up, stack, load, amass
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Объем, произведение (х * у), площадь, содержание, до кучи, стека, нагрузка, Amass
koohiiStory1: On many wheat cereal boxes, there is a disclaimer stating that "This package is sold by weight, not by volume. Some settling of contents may have occurred." well they only say that because they don´t want to be blamed by people getting really disappointed after they see what a small volume of cereal the box really contains.
koohiiStory2: The volume of the wheat crop is way down this year! Blame the weather!
kunYomi: つ.む、-づ.み、つ.もる、つ.もり
jp_example_words:
蓄積(ちくせき): accumulation, accumulate, store
積もり(つもり): intention, plan
見積り(みつもり): estimation, quotation
積極的(せっきょくてき): positive, active, proactive
体積(たいせき): capacity, volume
積む(つむ): pile up, stack
積もる(つもる): pile up
面積(めんせき): area
容積(ようせき): capacity, volume
jp_readingExamples: 積む (つ.む), 積もる (つ.もる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Grains get blamed for how much they accumulate. If the grains accumulate too much then they make more work for the farmers. If they accumulate too little, then they're starving the people. Ugh, grains just can't win with you people. They're blamed for everything.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a pile of grains accumulating in size while a person watches. No matter how large the pile gets, the person keeps blaming them for something!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now the grains have accumulated a ton, they're overflowing in their grain sacks, and the farmer freezes and says, "Now those are some sexy (せき) grains."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Is that why people become farmers? Because they think... accumulating a lot of grains is sexy? People are weird.
Ru_Meaning: volume, product (x*y), acreage, contents, pile up, stack, load, amass
Ru_Notes:
Фонетик: 責 (せめる、セキ ответственность).
Не путать: 績 (み、セキ достижения), 漬 (つける、シ мариновать), 債 (サイ долг).
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), ハ, 土 (земля), 目 (глаз), 禾 (ость колоса), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
jī: (графема) длительный, многолетний, затянувшийся
jī: (глаг/сущ) собирать, накапливать; (матем.) произведение, интегрирование; (кит. мед.) несварение желудка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grain (禾) is torture (責) to load
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: We can only accumulate so much wheat.  Finding other food sources is necessary.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " He ", " Responsibility " sound. Bronze inscription means volume, Shang Yang volume: "Sixteen (inch) five-pointed (inch) one is liter." refers to the volume of sixteen and one-fifth cubic inch as one liter (see "Shang Zhou Bronzeware Selected inscriptions).

The original meaning of " accumulation " is to accumulate grain. "Shuowen": "Accumulate, gather together. From He, blame the voice." Duan Yucai's note: "He and millet both have an accumulation." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Gong Liu": "Going to the frontier, and accumulating in the warehouse." "Han Feizi. "Ten Passes": "The city is not ruled, the warehouse has no millet, the mansion has no money, the library has no soldiers, and the town has no defensive equipment."

The extension of " accumulate " means to accumulate other things. Such as "Huainanzi. "Strategic Strategy": "The position is low, and the equipment is very disadvantageous. However, if one person sings and the world is harmonious, the grievance lies with the people." Yinqueshan Hanjian "Yanzi. "Eleventh" Jane 588: "The accumulation of wealth can not be divided into people to raise alone is called stingy (mean), can not be self-supported (and) can not be divided into people called love.

" Accumulate " can also mean accumulated things. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Thirty-three Years of Xi Gong: "You have a product for a day when you live, and a guard for a night when you walk." "Criminal Law Chronicles": "The one who swallows keeps the guard, and the one who finishes keeps the accumulation."

The meaning of accumulation is also derived from the meaning of how long and how long. Such as "Zhou Li. Land official. "The survivor": "The dedication of the palm of the state, in order to be beneficial." Zheng Xuan's note: "The less is the commission, the more is the accumulation." "Guan Zi. Four Seasons: "Prosperity will lead to prosperity, and tyranny will lead to death."

" Accumulate " means habitual, accumulated over time. "Xunzi. "Uncovering": "Private what it accumulates, lest you hear its evil." Yang Chi's note: "Accumulate, practice." "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Later Marriage": "The orphan of my ex-husband, dare not fight for family with my son.

" Product " means the result of multiplying numbers. Such as "Nine Chapters Arithmetic. "Shang Gong": "Now there is a square 堢壔. The abbot is six feet and six feet tall, and the height is one foot five feet. Ask the product geometry?" "Insufficiency of surplus": "Multiply the weight of each inch by one inch to obtain the weight of the jade."

" Accumulation " also means retention and stagnation. Such as "Zhuangzi. "The Way of Heaven": "The Way of Heaven is fortune without accumulation, so everything comes into being." Lu Deming explained: "Accumulation means stagnation and stagnation."
humanum_short_description_en: From " He ", " Responsibility " sound. The original meaning is to accumulate grain.
humanum_full_description:
從「禾」，「責」聲。金文表示容積，商鞅量：「爰積十六尊（寸）五分尊（寸）壹為升。」指以十六又五分之一立方寸的容積為一升（參《商周青銅器銘文選》）。

　　「積」的本義是積聚穀物。《說文》：「積，聚也。从禾，責聲。」段玉裁注：「禾與粟皆得偁積。」如《詩．大雅．公劉》：「迺埸迺疆，迺積迺倉。」《韓非子．十過》：「城郭不治，倉無積粟，府無儲錢，庫無甲兵，邑無守具。」

　　「積」引申表示積聚其他事物。如《淮南子．兵略》：「勢位至賤，而器械甚不利，然一人唱而天下和之者，積怨在於民也。」銀雀山漢簡《晏子．十一》簡588：「積財不能分人獨自養之謂粦（吝），不能自養有（又）不能分人之謂愛。」

　　「積」亦可表示積聚之物。如《左傳．僖公三十三年》：「居則具一日之積，行則備一夕之衛。」杜預注：「積，芻米菜薪。」《漢書．刑法志》：「刖者使守囿，完者使守積。」

　　從積聚義也引申出多、久的意思。如《周禮．地官．遺人》：「掌邦之委積，以待施惠。」鄭玄注：「少曰委，多曰積。」《管子．四時》：「治積則昌，暴虐積則亡。」

　　「積」表示習慣的、積久漸成的。《荀子．解蔽》：「私其所積，唯恐聞其惡也。」 楊倞注：「積，習。」《顏氏家訓．後娶》：「前夫之孤，不敢與我子爭家，提攜鞠養，積習生愛，故寵之。」

　　「積」表示數字相乘的結果。如《九章算術．商功》：「今有方堢壔，方一丈六尺，高一丈五尺。問積幾何？」《九章算術．盈不足》：「各以一寸之重乘之，得玉石之積重。」

　　「積」還表示留滯、積滯。如《莊子．天道》：「天道運而無所積，故萬物成。」陸德明釋文：「積，謂積滯不通。」
humanum_short_description: 從「禾」，「責」聲。本義是積聚穀物。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
積 (Simplified: 积)
Pinyin: jī
English Definition: to amass; to accumulate; to store; measured quantity (such as area of volume); product (the result of multiplication); to integrate (math.); to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.); old; long-standing
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 禾
Pictophonetic: 責 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 責 [ zé ] one's responsibility, duty
Example Words:
積極 [ jī jí ]: active; energetic; vigorous; positive (outlook); proactive
積極性 [ jī jí xìng ]: zeal; initiative; enthusiasm; activity
積累 [ jī lěi ]: to accumulate; accumulation; cumulative; cumulatively
More: 積* | *積 | *積*

积积 		accumulate, store up, amass, long (time), old, deep-rooted, longstanding, product (mathematics)

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 責 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 責 [ zé ] one's responsibility, duty
①聚集：積少成多。處心積慮。積儲。積憤。積鬱。積怨。積願。積累(l噄)。積攢。
②數學上指乘法運算的得數：積數。乘積。體積。容積。
③中醫指兒童消化不良的病：這孩子有積。捏積。

積累 [ jī lěi ]: to accumulate; accumulation; cumulative; cumulatively

積字的基本解释

積
jī
见“积”。

積字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》資昔切，入昔，精。］
［《廣韻》子智切，去寘，精。］
“积1”的繁体字。
(1)积聚，贮藏。
(2)指贮积起来的钱物等。
(3)累积；堆叠。
(4)堆子；垛子。指累叠在一起的东西。
(5)蕴积，蕴蓄。参见“積中”。
(6)留滞。
(7)郁积于心。
(8)长久。
(9)超过，甚于。
(10)指渊博出众。
(11)增加。
(12)经过。
(13)过分。
(14)习惯的，积久渐成的。
(15)通“績”。功绩，劳绩。
(16)通“漬”。疾病。
(17)通“迹”。参见“積射士”。
(18)见“積伶”。
(19)量词。用于成堆之物。
(20)指寒积、食积等病症。
(21)数学中称若干个数相乘的结果。

積字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　積； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页859第24
【廣韻】子昔切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】資息切，?音跡。【說文】聚也。【增韻】累也。堆?也。【易·大有】大車以載，積中不敗也。又【升卦】積小以高大。【詩·周頌】積之栗栗。【禮·月令】仲秋命有司，趣民多積聚。【前漢·食貨志】積貯者，天下之大命也。　又【儀禮·士冠禮】皮弁服素積。【鄭註】積猶辟也，以素爲裳，辟蹙其要中。　又【集韻】則歷切，音績。亦聚也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】子智切【正韻】資四切，?音恣。聚也，儲蓄也。【詩·大雅】乃積乃倉。【周禮·天官·小宰】掌其牢禮委積。【註】委積，謂牢米薪芻給賓客道用也。又【大司徒】令野修道委積。【註】少曰委，多曰積，皆所以給賓客。　又叶恣此切，音子。【詩·周頌】有實其積，萬億及秭。

Traditional Chinese characters for "积1".
(1) Accumulate and store.
(2) Refers to accumulated money, etc.
(3) Accumulation; stacking.
(4) Duozi; Duozi. Refers to things stacked together.
(5) Accumulate, accumulate. See "in the product".
(6) Stay and stay.
(7) Stagnation in the heart.
(8) Long-term.
(9) To exceed, to exceed.
(10) Refers to profound and outstanding.
(11) Increase.
(12) Go through.
(13) Excessive.
(14) The habitual, the accumulated over time.
(15) Through "achievement". Merit, hard work.
(16) Through "stain". disease.
(17) Through "trace". See "Jaeger".
(18) See "Jiling".
(19) Quantifiers. Used for piles of things.
(20) Refers to diseases such as cold accumulation and food accumulation.
(21) In mathematics, it is called the result of multiplying several numbers.

Old glyph
product
Name meaning
Nothing.
jī
см. 积
Radicals: 禾, 責  (grain, blame)
Meaning Mnemonic
Grains get blamed for how much they accumulate. If the grains accumulate too much then they make more work for the farmers. If they accumulate too little, then they're starving the people. Ugh, grains just can't win with you people. They're blamed for everything.
Picture a pile of grains accumulating in size while a person watches. No matter how large the pile gets, the person keeps blaming them for something!
Reading Mnemonic
Now the grains have accumulated a ton, they're overflowing in their grain sacks, and the farmer freezes and says, "Now those are some sexy (せき) grains."
Is that why people become farmers? Because they think... accumulating a lot of grains is sexy? People are weird.

Examples: 積む (つ.む), 積もる (つ.もる)
亠 (крышка), ハ, 土 (земля), 目 (глаз), 禾 (ость колоса), 貝 (раковина)
Фонетик: 責 (せめる、セキ ответственность).
Не путать: 績 (み、セキ достижения), 漬 (つける、シ мариновать), 債 (サイ долг).
